summary: This document is an FBI email chain forwarding an external email sent to Mark L. Epstein. The forwarded email, from 'Anthony Pompliano', contains extortion threats and claims that Donald Trump had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island, and that the sender is an informant for Iran's IRGC.

keyFacts: An individual named Anthony Pompliano sent an extortion email to Mark L. Epstein, demanding $10,000.
The email contains an unverified allegation that Donald Trump had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island.
The sender claims to be an informant for Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) and threatens to expose Trump through Mark Epstein.
The email was forwarded to the FBI, indicating it was treated as a potential threat or item of investigative interest.
The sender attempts to leverage geopolitical tensions (Trump/IRGC conflict) to extort money from Mark Epstein.
